verbose_text: For example, at postnatal (P) day 10, transformation from amoeboid to ramified microglia was accompanied by the loss of transcription factor Runx1 [XREF_BIBR]; at P28, microglia are fully ramified with concomitant decrease in microglial density and transcriptomic maturation that retains into adulthood in mice [XREF_BIBR].
